title: Secrets of Old Giants
description: A mortal with a love of the great outdoors and an infinite curiosity, Elodie Santiago has always felt a strange calling to the Redwoods.A fae with a strong distrust of mortal and fae alike, Trevin Greenthistle is trying to find his footing and confidence as the estate heir.When the two cross paths puzzle pieces start falling, and a danger threatens the very lands they call home. They soon find themselves desperately trying to piece the puzzle together to save not only the Old Giants but each other.
author: Kelly Virens
